description: Try our easy to follow Veggie Caesar-style Salad With Garlic & Herb Croutons recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Veggie Caesar-style Salad With Garlic & Herb Croutons
name: Veggie Caesar-style Salad With Garlic & Herb Croutons Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the leaves from 2 romaine or cos lettuces in a bowl with 6 sliced spring onions, 2 sliced celery stalks and 1 sliced cucumber. Drizzle over 8 tablespoons ready-made Caesar salad dressing, scatter over 100 g ready-made croutons, season, toss to mix well and serve.
